findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose the parties to significant financial risks in case of breaches or claims arising under the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The clause stating that liability shall not be limited under any circumstances can lead to unpredictable financial exposure for both parties.
findings.evidence_quote: No event shall be limited by the limitation of liability clause.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes over ownership and usage of any IP developed during the term of the agreement.
Without audit rights, there may be limited ability to verify compliance with terms, increasing the risk of undisclosed breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The three-year term for confidentiality may not be sufficient depending on the nature of the confidential information shared.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
